title: Turns Out I’m Crazy - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Apathetic Protagonist   Body Swap   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Confinement   Cruel Characters   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Depression   Inferiority Complex   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Psychopaths   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Reversible Couple   R*pe   Second Chance   S*xual Abuse   Twisted Personality   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Xī Zǐxù   西子绪
description:
Lu Zhengfei killed Chen Qianqing.

He disabled Chen Qianqing’s legs, and blinded his eyes, locking him up with chains in his house. Then, he watched with his eyes wide as he died.

Injuries inflicted in the name of love would always end in tragedy.

Did Lu Zhengfei regret it? Of course, he did. And so, God gave him another chance.

But this time, he found that he himself—became Chen Qianqing.>
